content: **geowave hat ** ======================================= the geowave hat is a striped crochet hat with a really unique texture and i promise it s a lot simpler than it looks the pattern is written for 4 sizes from baby up to adult large so this is a great pattern to make in bulk for gifts the hat is crocheted from the bottom up for the ribbing you will use the smaller hook for a nice snug fit for the body of the hat you will go up to the larger hook size **yarn requirements** baby c1 76 yds / 69 m c2 52 yds / 48 m total 128 yds / 117 m toddler/child c1 90 yds / 82 m c2 64 yds / 59 m total 154 yds / 141 m adult small c1 113 yds / 103 m c2 80 yds / 73 m total 193 yds / 176 m adult large c1 133 yds / 122 m c2 98 yds / 90 m total 231 yds / 212 m --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2020 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
